Package me.prettyprint.hom

Interface Summary
KeyConcatenationStrategy Keys in Cassandra cannot inherently be multi-field, so a strategy must be employed to concatenate fields together.
 

Class Summary
CassandraPersistenceProvider  
CFMappingDef<T> Holder for the mapping between a Class annotated with Entity and the Cassandra column family name.

CollectionMapperHelper  
EntityManagerConfigurator Config wrapper around the properties map required in the JPA specification
EntityManagerFactoryImpl  
EntityManagerImpl Handles entity management by scanning classpath for classes annotated with Entity and providing basic load and save methods.
HectorObjectMapper Maps a slice of HColumns to an object's properties.
KeyConcatenationDelimiterStrategyImpl Keys in Cassandra cannot inherently be multi-field, so a strategy must be employed to concatenate fields together.
KeyDefinition Defines properties used for representing and constructing a cassandra key and mapping to/from POJO property(ies).
